techniqueDifficultyExplanation: This video primarily involves simple stretching exercises such as neck stretch, seated cat & cow, and happy baby, which are typical in beginner-level yoga and stretching routines. The description emphasizes the relaxation aspect and the personal adjustments one can make, indicating low complexity. User comments also highlight the simplicity and relaxation of the routine.
effortDifficultyExplanation: The workout is described as a 20-minute stretch routine meant for relaxation and recovery after more intensive exercises. This indicates a low energy expenditure typical for activities focused on flexibility and stretching. The user comments emphasize the calming and relaxing nature of the workout, confirming its light effort requirement.
requiredFitnessLevelExplanation: The technique and effort difficulties align this workout with a broad range of fitness levels. The routine is beginner-friendly due to its simplicity and light effort, but since the workout is over 20 minutes long, it also fits intermediate levels. Advanced users may also participate for recovery and flexibility purposes, especially after more intense workouts. The video description encourages personalization, allowing users to adjust tension and duration per stretch, supporting its accessibility across multiple fitness levels.
